ingredients.ingredient: 2 chilled full-size chocolate-covered, nougat-filled candy bars (such as Snickers®)

cookingTips: Freeze candy bars for at least 4 hours to prevent melting during frying
Keep oil at exactly 350°F; too hot burns coating, too cool makes it greasy
Fry for only 30-45 seconds per side; this is a speed operation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through quick frying technique to keep the chocolate and filling inside warm without burning the exterior batter.
